markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Parry (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=367) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 146 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirements.

<title level="2">Dueling Parry (Fighter) leads to...</title>
[Dueling Dance (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=407), [Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=389), [Selfless Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1958)
name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
requirement: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
